injuries.content: 20220829 Toronto Blue Jays: CF Luis Miguel Maya was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220829 Washington Nationals: CF Jose Cadenas was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220829 San Diego Padres: RF Alex Verdugo was injured being hit by a pitch. The Diagnosis: bruised forearm. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 1 day. 20220829 Cleveland Indians: SS Francisco Lindor was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: hamstring tightness. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 2 days. 20220829 Baltimore Orioles: C Evan Skoug was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: mild abdominal strain. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 4 days. 20220829 New York Mets: LF Chase Vallot was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: sore back. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 2 days. 20220829 Boston Red Sox: SP Luiz Gohara was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220830 Boston Red Sox: Luiz Gohara diagnosed with a sore thumb, is day-to-day for 2 days. 20220830 Cincinnati Reds: 3B Greg Burnett was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: knee soreness. He's expected to miss about one week. 20220830 Boston Red Sox: SP Kodi Medeiros was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220830 Los Angeles Angels: RP Dan Reynolds was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220831 Oakland Athletics: Garrett Fulenchek diagnosed with a torn flexor tendon in his elbow, will miss 12 months. 20220831 Oakland Athletics: Buster Posey has suffered a setback in his recovery. He is not expected to recover for another 4 days. 20220831 Los Angeles Angels: Dan Reynolds diagnosed with a strained biceps, will miss 7 weeks. 20220831 Miami Marlins: SP Jose Urena was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: sprained ankle. He's expected to miss about 3-4 weeks. 20220831 Cleveland Indians: SP Thomas Hatch was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: shoulder soreness. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 4 days. 20220831 Baltimore Orioles: SS Kendall Simmons was injured in a collision at a base. The Diagnosis: shoulder tendinitis. He's expected to miss about 8 weeks. 20220831 Seattle Mariners: 3B Jeimer Candelario was injured while throwing the ball. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220831 Seattle Mariners: 1B Chaney Rogers was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: bruised thumb. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 6 days. 20220831 Texas Rangers: LF Kyle Tucker was injured on a defensive play. The Diagnosis: sprained thumb. He's expected to miss about 2 weeks. 20220831 Oakland Athletics: RF Zach Cone was injured while throwing the ball. The diagnosis is not yet known. 20220831 Houston Astros: RP Riley Thompson was injured while pitching. The Diagnosis: mild hamstring strain. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last one week. 20220901 Los Angeles Angels: Tyler Viza diagnosed with a sore shoulder, will miss 4 weeks. 20220901 Washington Nationals: Jose Cadenas diagnosed with a finger sprain, will miss 3 weeks. 20220901 Atlanta Braves: LF Jon Nunnally Jr. was injured on a defensive play. news.content: 20220901 RF Zach Cone of the Oakland Athletics honored: Wins the MLB AL Batter of the Month Award. 20220901 2B Darnell Sweeney of the Philadelphia Phillies honored: Wins the MLB NL Batter of the Month Award. 20220901 CL Yoiber Marquina of the Cleveland Indians honored: Wins the MLB AL Pitcher of the Month Award. 20220901 SP Corey Knebel of the Los Angeles Dodgers honored: Wins the MLB NL Pitcher of the Month Award. 20220901 SS Jorge S?nchez of the Texas Rangers honored: Wins the MLB AL Rookie of the Month Award. 20220901 RF Taylor Trammell of the Chicago Cubs honored: Wins the MLB NL Rookie of the Month Award. 20220903 Colorado Rockies: Boyd Vander Kooi got suspended 3 games after ejection following arguing a strike call. 20220903 St. Louis Cardinals: Steven Moya goes 1-5 against the Chicago Cubs, extending his hitting streak to 20 games! 20220904 St. Louis Cardinals: Steven Moya goes 0-5 against the Chicago Cubs, ending his hitting streak at 20 games. 20220904 Chicago White Sox: Jake Arrieta pitches a 4-hit shutout against the Toronto Blue Jays with 3 strikeouts and 2 BB allowed! 20220905 2B Forrest Wall of the Toronto Blue Jays honored: Wins the MLB AL Player of the Week Award. 20220905 RF Taylor Trammell of the Chicago Cubs honored: Wins the MLB NL Player of the Week Award.
